# PortusSophia™ Canonical Content Submission

## Content Type
<!-- Check one -->
- [ ] Postulate
- [ ] Doctrine
- [ ] Mapping
- [ ] Hashed Artifact
- [ ] Documentation Update

## Canonical Verification Checklist

- [ ] Content is foundational and immutable
- [ ] Content type correctly identified
- [ ] Formal language used throughout
- [ ] No interpretations or metaphysical expansions
- [ ] PortusSophia™ trademark properly formatted (with ™)
- [ ] Aligned with existing canonical content
- [ ] Cryptographic hash provided (for artifacts)
- [ ] No WebKernel, governance, or narrative content
- [ ] No implementation details
- [ ] Minimal content approach maintained

## Non-Canonical Content Redirects

If your content is **not** canonical:

- **WebKernel** → `portussophia/portussophia-webkernel`
- **Governance** → `portussophia/portussophia-governance`
- **Narrative** → Appropriate narrative repository
- **Implementations** → Implementation repository
